item.description:
CT REIA Members: $10
Not-Yet-Members: $15

Click here to register and learn more

Come join us as we walk through this newly renovated 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom cape. This is CT REIA member Frank Forzano's first renovation.

In addition to showing you the before and after, Frank will show you:

* How, as a realtor, he narrowed down the good deals by focusing on a few numbers in the MLS sheets.
* His secret for working favorably with REO agents.
* His contractor will describe his innovative solution to broken windows, dealing with several layers of wallpaper ( 4 layers in the living room!) and the value of meeting the neighbors.

Bring your clipboard to take notes and your business cards for networking. See how it's done right here in Connecticut!

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: Connecticut Real Estate Rehab Meeting - April 2013
